summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of 'Build your custom frame' pixel art converter. All 13 requested features verified working correctly.
passed_tests: Page title shows 'Build your custom frame' (no Pixel Art Studio/Converter branding)
Image upload via file input works correctly
Image cropper appears after upload with draggable crop box (handle-less)
Cropper is draggable - position changes when dragged
Hide/Show Cropper button toggles cropper visibility correctly
Pixel art 32x32 generates correctly after image upload
Image adjustments sliders present and functional (Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Hue Shift)
Real-time slider adjustments update pixel art
Zoom controls (+/-) work on pixel art canvas (tested 100% to 125%)
Paint, Fill, Pick tools are present and selectable
Confirm Custom Frame button is present and shows placeholder alert
Add to Cart button is present and shows placeholder alert
New Image button resets the app to upload screen
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper component structure with separation of concerns
All interactive elements have appropriate data-testid attributes for testing
Image processing uses k-means clustering and Floyd-Steinberg dithering for quality pixel art
The 40-color palette is properly defined in colorUtils.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 13 features from requirements verified working. App is client-side only - no backend APIs. Confirm Custom Frame and Add to Cart buttons show placeholder alerts (ready for Framer e-commerce integration).

features_tested.image_adjustments: PASS - All 4 sliders work (Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Hue)
features_tested.tools: PASS - Paint, Fill, Pick tools present
